Review.Titre: No support or even response for purchase that doesn't work
Review.Contenu: Purchased a copy of Dragon NaturallySpeaking 15 after having a computer meltdown.  I am paralyzed from the shoulders down, so I needed immediate access. SoftwareCW had a great purchase price, so I purchased and downloaded it on my new computer ASAP. It did not work properly from the word go. I reinstalled it and continued to have the same problems. I reached out to SoftwareCW to ask for support and got no reply. There isn't even an option for a refund but you have open the download. You will never have any idea whether the software works until you open the download, so if it doesn't work, you're screwed, just like I was for $452.60 I will never see again.

Review.Titre: Beware: Tried to buy Microsoft 365 Personal
Review.Contenu: Tried to buy Microsoft 365 Personal; credit card was charged but no download, no order listed on website, and no response to my email. Second attempt at support email--link non-functional. Poor service or fraud???

Review.Titre: Purchased the Turbo Cad package and…
Review.Contenu: Purchased the Turbo Cad package and never got a download link from the company. No customer service ever joined the chat bot and no phone number listed on the site for customer service.  Product paid for and never received.  I don't recommend buying for this group04/47

Bought MS Office 2010 2 licenses. Installed 2 on 1 laptop and 1 on a work computer. Desktop gave me MS office registration issues. Called MS Support and checked on license. They conveyed that the license have been used by too many users and could not being reactivated. Bottom line I got ripped off , end up with only 1 usable license overly popular.

Review.Titre: Unbelievable Price- Too Good to Be True
Review.Contenu: The price for Microsoft Office was great.  Paid the bill and tried to follow the instructions to download.  No luck after hours of following instructions.  Finally gave up.  The next day I receive an email saying a customer service case has been opened.  Never talked to anyone, what's the problem?  We had a pricing error and won't be able to honor the price.  We have however refunded your card.  Seems there are laws regarding false advertising.  Maybe the feds need to be involved in internet sales.

I received an item in error. They so far have refused to accept a return saying that the item has been opened. When I refered to their return policy it appears as though my item falls within the parameter.  Pricing was very fishy as my item was stated as being a special promotional price only to see it radically cheaper on the website now. I am skeptical about the ethics of this vendor.

I am retired. My income is from Social Security, no pension. I use Windows X P. I have upgraded five time my Microsoft Widows XP without any problems. Late last year I inadvertantly deleted my "Office" software.. I searched for a replacementand found Software CW. Iboughtand downloaded the 2013 edition of "Office". When I trid to install it in my computer I was notified that the 2013 version is not compatible with Windows XP. Accordingly, I asked the distributor for my money back. They have refused1 My complaint is that there should be a disclaimer associated with the purchase, not after the fact. SoftwareCW shouldewilling to refund my money since they have lost knothing.

Review.Titre: I CAN'T INSTALL LOGIC THAT I BOUGHT OVER 2 WEEKS AGO
Review.Contenu: I CAN'T BELIEVE THE HASSLE IT'S TAKEN TO GET THIS PRODUCT TO WORK. I'VE BEEN SHIPPED THE WRONG VERSION AFTER THE FIRST VERSION DIDN'T EVEN MAKE IT PAST INSTALL BECAUSE THERE WAS NO SERIAL NUMBER WITH THE PACKAGING. I am very close to disputing this purchase. I am frustrated.

Review.Titre: Mailed item to wrong address and customer service said oh well :(
Review.Contenu: I have a separate shipping and billing address on Paypal, they shipped to my billing address.  When I called customer service, they claimed it was correct.  Double checked with Paypal, not to mention received about a dozen other Paypal items prior few weeks and nothing was changed.  Customer service pretty told me I was on my own to get the item to me.  Game was cheap, but now I'm out the game and my money.  No good :(

Review.Titre: Reseller could give more warnings and more help
Review.Contenu: This is a software reseller.  They offer NO support.  You MUST go to the company whose software you bought to get any support.  There's a link telling you to check for key details.  I didn't see that.  I bought the software because I only planned to use it once so I bought Corel Paintbrush X9.  It's ONLY compatible with Windows 7 and 8.  Other companies have that in the body of the description or, better yet, in the NAME of the title "Paintbrush Pro x9 for Windows 7 and 8 ONLY.  I spent FIVE hours trying to find help.  I finally found Corel's number and have started getting help.  She told me how to find the download that came with the link.  There's NO instructions in the email.  It was in a tiny box in the upper right corner of my search page.  It didn't work.  Again, my problem for not reading the "key " page that is mentioned in the link.  Go directly to the seller.  Any company that doesn't highlight their warnings isn't a company I want to do business with.  I have actually had POP UP PAGES that said"  Are you sure your computer is compatible with this (old) software?  That type of warning  is too hard to miss.  I am also uncomfortable with their refund policy.  I really don't understand it.  To me, it's ambiguous and leans very heavily in their favor.  I know they may have people who take advantage when they have no problem, but an honest mistake should qualify for a refund.  It appears the onus is on the buyer.

I purchased my product tried to download it and my computer exited out of the program and started having issues the download was no longer available to me and when I tried redownloading it Microsoft told me it was an invalid account number. Total waste of money.

I ordered in good faith $300 worth of software on or about 11/25/15.  According to the website there was one copy available of what I ordered.  I received confirmation of that order.  The next thing I know I received an email that the item was out of stock.  Tough luck.  So I went on the website and searched again for the item, and lo and behold, there it is for $999 !!!Just looked now (12/9/15) and it's still for sale.  They should have accepted my order when they had it instead of getting greedy...Not at all happy with them.
I purchased from Software CW .  Architect program, that was three days ago and still don't have program
I thought I was ordering TurboTax for 2016 when in fact it was 2015. I did not notice it in your confirmation.My bad.

This was probably the most frustrating online purchase I've attempted in over 20 years on the web in transactions numbering in the hundreds. At the conclusion of numerous failed attempts to complete a simple order I got a message from Google saying they were interested in feedback regarding my purchase with Software CW.  However it's taken over two weeks for Google to give me this opportunity, and I no longer recall the specifics regarding at least 8 failed attempts to make a simple one item purchase. I was required to completely re-enter all or most of the order and personal info after every failed attempt with no indication from the system as to which items it found objectionable. Based on my experience, the Software CW order application is completely broken. I emphatically recommend that Google do not  endorse Software CW until they fix their unacceptably buggy and completely user unfriendly online order system.

My major complaints is are that I couldn't use a Visa Gift Card, to pay part of the bill.  I had to use my personal debit card to pay for it all.  I couldnt tell when I had paid for it because the next window says Buy Now, and for a more expensive price.  The previous review is no longer effective. I've purchased and used this program before.  About 7 years ago, and I LOVED IT.  The difference is that then, I bought the physical disc and installed it myself.  This time I'm getting the digital copy, and it's a major pain in the butt.  I will never do this again!

Review.Titre: Product sent was literally covered in dirt
Review.Contenu: Product I received was covered with dried mud; as if they dropped it in a mud puddle and let it dry before sending it.I suspect they get their merchandise from distributors that are dumping stuff they cannot sell and SCW just turns around and sells it to unsuspecting customers.  Will NEVER purchase from them again.

The program saves a great deal of time and really worked better than expected.  Once I understood that I had to disable the virus protection, it worked very well. The technical service is the worst that I have ever known.  They are too busy trying to sell some program to fix some non existent problem on your computer to help with the program that you have already bought.

I recently ordered Smith Micro Clip Studio Paint EX from SoftwareCW through one of several retail marketplaces they use as auxiliary vendors for their merchandise. I did not know them as a company but knew the reputation of these marketplaces to be sound so I took a chance. The program was listed at a fantastic price, and there was a countdown for how long the deal would last. I ordered it. I even signed up for the free purchase protection from Google because this was a Google Trusted Store. That is the level of faith I thought I could have in them.This purchase was a Christmas present for my partner. It's not SoftwareCW's fault that we're struggling students, I get that. But I bought a product at the advertised price from a company.I received Clip Studio Paint Pro. The Pro version lacks several key features of EX. I figured it was a mistake in shipping, every order confirmation I received indicated that I had purchased EX. In my package there was a paper slip directing me to address any issues with my order by contacting the SoftwareCW support team. I emailed them requesting a return label and the product I purchased. Credit where credit is due, the response time was excellent. The response, however, left a bad taste in my mouth."SoftwareCW Customer Support (SoftwareCW Customer Support)Dec 29, 11:56 AM CSTHi, please find attached a return label for you to use to return the software. You will be refunded in full once the item is received. I am very sorry for the inconvenience, the [marketplace] product page is mislisted and should have said Pro, not EX.If you have any other questions, please let me know!Regards,SoftwareCW Customer Support"The problem I have here is that this was the advertised price. This was the price listed for the marketplace I shopped through and it was initially provided as a link it through Google's shop feature. I honestly believed I could have faith in this purchase. This was their listing error.  I don't want a refund, I want the product I ordered. I worked extra shifts to have Christmas money and I could afford the price I paid. I might even have been able to afford more, before I finished allocating Christmas money, but having made a purchase in good faith from a seemingly reputable company I didn't save extra for them to tell me I have to pay for their mistake. My partner's excitement has become significant disappointment and I had to figure out what to do. This wasn't just a Christmas present, it was also something he needs for school. We can't have no software, so their offer of a refund is something I can't take. I just now have software that I will have to replace later instead of software that will last him throughout his classes as I intended.I expect better from retail companies. I expect companies to pay for their own mistakes and then fix them, not pass that burden on to their consumers. My living situation might not be their fault, but it's not an uncommon one for their prospective clientele. I know that I won't be recommending them to anyone I know.
I have read to receive the Quicken program I ordered

Review.Titre: Great prices on older software releases
Review.Contenu: Could use a little more communication, and the software I ordered arrived a little later than I was expecting, but it did arrive and was exactly what I was looking for.  If you're in a hurry you may want to pay more elsewhere, but if you don't mind waiting an extra week or so this is a great place to get your software.  I would have liked to get an e-mail saying that there was a delay, but in my case it didn't cause any problems.

Review.Titre: Did what they said, plus they use paypal
Review.Contenu: So not much to say, Everything worked as it was supposed to. I did a digital purchase so I can't speak on their delivery service, but everything did work without a hitch. I tip my hat to the company for allowing the option to pay via paypal. It is really welcoming not having to give out your credit card number to every store from which you buy from. this was the main reason why I chose this service over places like amazon. The only con that I have is that the don't tell you in your that you have to wait up to a day for your transaction to go through to recieve your product key. I immediately thought I just was scammed, until I looked at their FAQ. Overall relatively paid free experience

I purchased a digital download version of software and was given a link to download the software. However, the original download link didn't work. I emailed customer service and within an hour I had a new working link. I would have no reservations buying from this company again. Although the broken download link made me a bit nervous to start with, it was quickly and professionally resolved.

But other than that i am pretty happy with the software. Heck back in the 90s i used  Tirbocad. Ty for your help

Purchase experience was great.  Great price, software was as described.  Had a slight issue with delivery.  There was a two day delay in shipping the product initially.  When I requested, they immediately refunded the expedited shipment fee (for  USPS express delivery) that I paid.

Everything went smoothly with the purchase and download, but when I tried to activate the product I kept getting an error message that the key was invalid. The problem was quickly resolved with online support -- apparently the key was mistyped when it was sent.

I ordered TurboTax on physical disk at a very good price. The merchandise was delivered promptly. Unfortunately, I didn't notice until after the package was opened that it was the previous year's product. I went back to the order page, and only then did I really notice it said 2015 in the description instead of the 2016 product I wanted. It was my error; I should have read (and thought about) the description more carefully. In my defense, tax prep is always for the previous calendar year, and I probably thought "2016, so 2015 is right", and kept going. Since the package was opened, it's non-returnable and I'm just writing it off to experience. A prominent banner stating "PREVIOUS YEARS" or something like that, making it more obvious, would have been appreciated, though.They quickly delivered exactly what I ordered. Just make sure you're ordering what you really want!

Review.Titre: Came on time and as exactly how it was described
Review.Contenu: My Microsoft Office Home and Business 2013 came on time and as exactly how it was described. I like the product overview information as it was detailed and organized and made it easy for me to confirm that my computer specs meet the software requirement.
I had a great experience and wanted to order more software but you were down this last weekend.  Bummer!  I had to go to a different supplier.I'll be back if your still up.

Review.Titre: 99.9% - One, quickly rectified, problem. Otherwise - Perfect!
Review.Contenu: The key didn't work. I bought the MS Office Pro package at night, so no one was in the office. I downloaded the software, received the key and *crunch*; the key didn't work. Aw, man! I was ready to rock and roll. I left an email with them and the next morning at opening time before I could get the follow up started, I had a replacement key that worked fine, and a note of apology just that fast! Kudos to the sales team!The bad key is the only reason for not quite getting that 5th star.
Resolved my installation/membership problem quickly. Can’t wait to use it.

Review.Titre: Purchased from SoftwareCW several times and only once has been problematic. (5 of 6 Office 2010 Product Keys were already activated--unusable)
Review.Contenu: Let's get the bad part out of the way. In December 2013, I purchased six copies of Office 2010. Five (5) of the six (6) product keys would not work. I received an "already activated" error when using them. The first product key worked, the remaining 5 did not. When I tried to use the 2nd product key a month after purchase, I notified SoftwareCW of the problem and they got back to me with a new product key 2 days later. I only allocate one Office license every few weeks, so I did not know anything was wrong until a month after purchase. So far, SoftwareCW has issued me one (1) new product key. Now, it's near the end of January 2014 and I just noticed that the remaining 4 unused product keys were invalid (i.e., got the already activated message after installation). I trust SoftwareCW will provide me with 4 unused product keys, but we shall see. Over the past year, I have purchased operating systems, database software and a few other miscellaneous software packages from them and have not had an issue with those purchases. Overall the experience has been okay. So far, they have been trustworthy and have responded within 1 or 2 days to inquiries. Here are some additional thoughts...SoftwareCW often appears to be the price leader for big-name software.All questions, comments and problems must be communicated via e-mail.They do have a toll-free number (888-973-0315), but it immediately goes to voice mail with a recorded message saying that they do not offer support via the telephone.They are slow-to-respond compared with the big-name online stores like NewEgg and Amazon.

Review.Titre: easy way to get good software
Review.Contenu: i have purchased several software items (all Adobe) and they have installed and worked well.  the only issue was that Premiere Pro only worked with DV and not HD.  i found this out after the purchase.  However, since most of my work is DV it has worked out.

I've been looking for a quality software that would allow me to make cards, posters, banners, etc. I was in a real pinch. I'd purchased a program that I thought was for the Mac but, come to find out, it was for a PC. My aunt had passed away and I was making a program for her service. I researched different software that day and ended up choosing the Hallmark one. The price was right, and so was the program. Everything has a learning curve and this was no exception. I chose to make a card as it would give me four pages to type on. The first, her picture, date of birth, death and a nice verse. The second  page, a poem, third page the order of service and the fourth page, the eulogy. During the time that I was working on it, I became very frustrated. Looking back now, I realize it was because I was in a bind to get it done that night so that I could send it to my cousin in Oklahoma and I was exhausted.  I was able to put it together exactly how I wanted it. I'd like to see much more clipart but I haven't had the time to play with it again to look and see if I just missed it. I ended up going online and downloaded what I needed. After I chose the font I wanted, I tried to print it and ended up with what looked like hieroglyphics.  i ended up having to use the basic Times Roman. It looked fine, just not what I wanted. I still need to go back and research what happened and why. My cousins were delighted with the program and I was pleased that it has a low learning curve and I picked up on how to use it quickly.

No problems. . Delivered on time. They claimed to sell a full version of office for a low price. That's exactly what I got . Cant ask for anything more. I wish all other co. woulddo the same. Will buy again...

I was looking for tax software, found your site, made a purchase quickly & just as the purchase screen exited my view I noticed it said the year I had purchased was the wrong year for the taxes I wanted to do.  I sent an email to the company explaining all this and incredibly they quickly refunded the purchase money back to my account and I did appreciate that as it allowed me to then purchase the software I needed.  Great bunch of people & obviously square shooters too!!  Thank you.

I went with Software CW after reading their reviews and have not had any trouble. Software CW quickly answered my questions

Review.Titre: I was initially concerned due to the low price, but everything was perfect!

Great service, I placed my order and because I wanted it within a couple of days, I choose 2nd Day Delivery.  It came right on time with no problems.  I had it installed on my computer and it is great.I would check with SoftwareCW first before looking anywhere else for my software purchases.

Review.Titre: Bought software from this company and…

Review.Titre: Great price, free super fast shipping - would shop here again!

After I received my order, there was an email explaining a change they had to make (in my favor).  I had a couple questions which were quickly answered.  This was my first time purchasing from SoftwareCW and I am very willing to continue buying from them.

It wasn't easy to get my purchase to work.  However, I believe that the company and product were of high quality, quickly delivered, priced fairly, and described very well.

Review.Titre: My first purchase with SoftwareCW and no problems!
Review.Contenu: Since this was my very first purchase I do not have a lot to say.Just glad that it turned out to be easy, accurate and problem free!Whether or not I will ever make another purchase with SoftwareCW depends on their having products in which I am interested in buying.

Review.Titre: Received software as advertised and on time.

Though I haven't used all the applications yet, they all seem to be functioning effectively.  This is my first purchase from CW, and based on this single experience, I give them full points!  Thanks, CW.

Review.Contenu: I have never been a fan of Adobe so when I was introduced to Nuance which has now changed to Kofax I will never go back to inferior PDF programs.

Review.Titre: Transaction was fast, with no surprises
Review.Contenu: This was my first OEM software purchase, and it went like a charm. I didn't need all the bells and whistles of Acrobat X, so bought the OEM version of Acrobat 9 at one third the price. It installed normally, was registered easily, and has been updated twice. I'm a happy camper!
I have looked for this download for a long time and am grateful to have found it.   It downloaded easily and has worked perfectly ever since.  No glitches or problems.
Everything went perfectly... the purchase, the download, and the program has functioned flawlessly ever since.

Software came within the specified time.  Perfect condition, no problems.  Installed and working just fine.  What can I say?  It's doing what it's supposed to.  Good price too!

I purchased software at a very good price.  At first I had trouble activating it on one of my computers, but then in a quick reply from customer service the issue was resolved.

Review.Titre: I had a good experience from the ordering through the shipping.
Review.Contenu: My laptop was in for repairs with HP.  There was a possibility that the techs might have to replace the hard drive.  I didn't have the disk for Quicken so I felt it was prudent to buy it.  HP did not erase my programs so I have merely looked inside your packaging.  I feel this was a good decision in case I might need to reload Quicken in some future time.  The price was right too.

Review.Titre: Exactly as promised and quickly delivered
Review.Contenu: I ordered software from SoftwareCW.  It was delivered quickly and was exactly what I expected to be getting.  The price was the lowest I found on the internet from a reputable seller!  Perfect transaction!

i was looking for Adobe Creative Suite and some of the places were wanting 1200-1300 for it, which my boss would not sign off on. however after looking at softwareCW.com, i showed the price to my boss who signed off.  it was a rather lengthy download process, but it was worth it.  the product key was emailed an hour after it was purchased, which made installing it on my users computer even more effective.  Thanks Guys.
Software CW was excellent to work with, very responsive and reliable.  I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Would certainly buy from the company again

This company were responsive, offered fantastic pricing, and delivered faster than expected to the other side of the world. Wow team.Well done.

I purchased a product that didn't meet the expectations nor did my system meet the necessary requirements though my system was actually in alignment with the system requirements listed on the site.I reached out to support immediately and expressed my concerns and was given a very reasonable and acceptable resolution without any hassle.I was very pleased with both the aggressiveness of support to professionally address the problem, the no hassle attitude and their response.Would definitely do business with them again!

Thank you for your site that provides customers a quality product at a reasonable price.  In addition, I used your customer support with great success.

Review.Titre: I think it is a very helpful program
Review.Contenu: I think it is a very helpful program, we do our return labels, and cover letters with your program, and love it.

No surprises, just excellent pricing and even better customer support. Took a look at MS Office 360 after ordering, did'nt like it, cancelled the that order and reordered MS Office 2010. No hassel service.
This is a great vendor for software.  Order handled well/shipping very quick/delivery  within 2 days to CA.  Overall great online software vendor.
Needed an extra Windows xp license and SoftwareCW delivered quickly and at a great price.  Next time I need software they  will be on the provider short list.

Review.Titre: I will now check SoftwareCW FIRST for all software meeds.
Review.Contenu: Very quick delivery of download code at the best price on the web.  This is a serious software company!  Highly recommended.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: Windows 7 Professional  64 bit retail/Prompt Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I purchased Windows 7 Professional 64 bit (retail version)DVD,not OEM, from SoftwareCW on October 4, 2016 for a custom build PC that I planned on building a few months  from now.  After receiving the product in the mail, I got kind of skeptical about whether or not I will discover that the OS was genuine, so I emailed customer service about returning the product and the reason I decided to do so.  They reassured me that if I discovered that I was unable to use the product key for this OS I would get a full refund for the purchase, which wasn't cheap.  That gave me some peace of mind and I highly appreciated customer service prompt response to my concern and resolution option should any issue arise with this purchase.  Besides that, it's a plus for me that any company is still offering Windows 7 Professional for purchase, which I believe is suppose to end on Oct. 31 for both retail and OEM versions.  I will update this review upon completing my custom build.
SoftwareCW ships surprisingly fast! I have no complaints. I was pleased that they offer Microsoft Office 2013, since it is so hard to find these days. Overall I have no complaints.
The SoftwareCW Team is very professional and quick to respond to your e-mail, once they receive it.  This is what makes their customer service so great!
I had a problem with my MS Office Home and Office product key. Not only did I get a response within 1/2 a day on a Saturday, I was upgraded to MS Office Professional!
I've purchased from SoftwareCW a couple times now and the process has been very streamlined.  Always receive the products/keys in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Unbelievable price and service that can't be beat!
Review.Contenu: I did run into a problem with my download, however, customer service quickly answered by email and resolved the issue.  This was my first experience with softwarecw but definitely not my last.

Review.Titre: Trustworthy Supplier Sells Good Software at Good Price

It was a fair deal.  And they delivered what they promised in 24 hours.  I would do business with this company anytime.  They can be trusted.
My new device has allowed me to operate with a new freedom that my files will be saved no matter what happens to my computer.
